xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
## I am making a global assumption that I only need to include strings that are not already covered in classes. To see the lookup strings for the classes, go here. XWiki/GlobalClassTranslation

## If a string has the word "placeholder" after the "=" sign, it means text is coming. If it is blank after the "=" sign, that means the string can be ignored until further notice.

## CONFIGURATION
search.results.max=500

## ON HOMEPAGE
search.text.entry.findbutton=Find »

## SEARCH ENTRY BOX AND OVERALL ITEMS
search.text.entry.label=enter search terms
search.text.entry.button=
search.text.entry.help.link=Search Tips
search.text.entry.help.title=Search Tips

## Tab titles
##{0} is tab name, {1} is search result count, and {2} is the total count
search.tab.title.results={0} {1} results
search.tab.title.resultsmax_exceeds={0} ({1} results)

## Grid titles
search.grid.title.results={0} {1} results
search.grid.title.resultsmax_exceeds={0} ({1} results)

## Search URL
search.internal.tab.title.sankore=Library of educational resources Sankoré
search.external.tab.title.sankore=URLs selected by the community Sankoré
search.external.tab.title.google=Google results among the sites selected by Sankoré

## Search Tips Page
search.text.entry.help.text=

search.text.entry.help.button=Search Tips
search.find.no.results=There are no results matching your search. Please try again.
search.find.no.results.button=OK
search.advanced.search.button=Advanced Search

search.columns.menu.columns=Columns
search.columns.menu.sort_ascending=Sort Ascending
search.columns.menu.sort_descending=Sort Descending

search.pagination.pagesize.addbefore=-
search.pagination.pagesize.before=Show
search.pagination.pagesize.after=
search.pagination.pagesize.addafter=

search.pagination.displaying.resource=Displaying {0} - {1} Available Resources of About {2}
search.pagination.displaying.resource_resultsmax_exceeds=Displaying Resources {0} - {1} of the Top {2}

search.pagination.displaying.group=Displaying Groups {0} - {1} of About {2}
search.pagination.displaying.group_resultsmax_exceeds=Displaying Groups {0} - {1} of the Top {2}

search.pagination.displaying.member=Displaying Members {0} - {1} of About {2}
search.pagination.displaying.member_resultsmax_exceeds=Displaying Members {0} - {1} of the Top {2}

search.pagination.displaying.blog=Displaying Blogs {0} - {1} of About {2}
search.pagination.displaying.blog_resultsmax_exceeds=Displaying Blogs {0} - {1} of the Top {2}

search.pagination.displaying.curriki=Displaying pages {0} - {1} of About {2}
search.pagination.displaying.curriki_resultsmax_exceeds=Displaying Pages {0} - {1} of the Top {2}

## Pagination Buttons
search.pagination.first.button=< 
search.pagination.last.button=Last>>

## Pagination Buttons Rollovers
search.pagination.beforepage=Page
search.pagination.afterpage=of About {0}
search.pagination.afterpage_resultsmax_exceeds=of {0}
search.pagination.first=First Page
search.pagination.prev=Previous Page
search.pagination.next=Next Page
search.pagination.last=Last Page
search.pagination.refresh=Refresh

##RESOURCES TAB
search.resource.tab.title=Educational resource library Sankoré

##REVIEW

search.resource.review.selector.curriki=Reviewed Sankoré

search.resource.review.selector.not_reviewed=Resources not reviewed

##For Review column

search.resource.review.700=Part of an Exemplary Resource
search.resource.review.600=Good
search.resource.review.500=Part of a Good Resource
search.resource.review.400=Basic
search.resource.review.300=Part of a Basic Resource
search.resource.review.200=Partner
search.resource.review.100=Not Rated / Not Rateable

##For Rating column
search.resource.rating.0=Not rated
search.resource.rating.1=Unusable
search.resource.rating.2=Weak
search.resource.rating.3=Satisfactory
search.resource.rating.4=Strong
search.resource.rating.5=Outstanding
